name: The Little Rascals
tagline: Alfalfa is wooing Darla and his "He-Man-Woman-Hating" friends attempt to sabotage the relationship.

name: Exit Wounds
tagline: Orin Boyd, a tough cop in an inner-city precinct discovers a web of dirty cops and corruption.

name: I Can Do Bad All by Myself
Sleeping Beauty
tagline: A snubbed malevolent fairy casts a curse on a princess that only a prince can break, with the help of three good fairies.

name: The Grand Budapest Hotel
tagline: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous European hotel between the wars, and Zero Moustafa, the lobby boy who becomes his most trusted friend.

name: The Grey
tagline: After their plane crashes in Alaska, six oil workers are led by a skilled huntsman to survival, but a pack of merciless wolves haunts their every step.

name: My Bloody Valentine
tagline: Tom returns to his hometown on the tenth anniversary of the Valentine's night massacre that claimed the lives of 22 people. Instead of a homecoming, however, Tom finds himself suspected of committing the murders, and it seems like his old flame is the only one will believes he's innocent.

name: Underworld
tagline: Selene, a beautiful vampire warrior, is entrenched in a war between the vampire and werewolf races. Although she is aligned with the vampires, she falls in love with Michael, a werewolf who longs for the war to end.

name: Identity
tagline: Stranded at a desolate Nevada motel during a nasty rain-storm, ten strangers become acquainted with each other when they realize that they're being killed off one by one.

name: Sneakers
tagline: Complex but lighthearted thriller about computers and cryptography, government and espionage, secrets and deception and betrayal.

name: Like Mike
tagline: A 14-year-old orphan becomes an NBA superstar after trying on a pair of sneakers with the faded initials "M.J." inside.

name: A Cinderella Story
tagline: Routinely exploited by her wicked stepmother, the downtrodden Sam Montgomery is excited about the prospect of meeting her Internet beau at the school's Halloween dance.

name: Enemy at the Gates
tagline: A Russian sniper and a German sniper play a game of cat-and-mouse during the Battle of Stalingrad.

name: DragonHeart
tagline: The last dragon and a disillusioned dragonslaying knight must cooperate to stop an evil king who was given partial immortality.

name: Dennis the Menace
tagline: When his parents have to go out of town, Dennis stays with Mr. and Mrs. Wilson. The little menace is driving Mr. Wilson crazy, but Dennis is just trying to be helpful. Even to the thief who's arrived in town.

name: Broadcast News
tagline: Take two rival TV reporters: one handsome, one talented, both male. Add one producer, female. Mix well and watch the sparks fly.

name: The Phantom of the Opera
tagline: A young soprano becomes the obsession of a disfigured musical genius who lives beneath the Paris Opéra House.

name: The Gods Must Be Crazy
tagline: A comic allegory about a traveling Bushman who encounters modern civilization and its stranger aspects, including a clumsy scientist and a band of revolutionaries.

name: The Living Daylights
tagline: James Bond is living on the edge to stop an evil arms dealer from starting another world war. Bond crosses all seven continents in order to stop the evil Whitaker and General Koskov.

name: Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult
tagline: Frank Drebin comes out of retirement to help Police Squad infiltrate a gang of terrorists planning to detonate a bomb at the Academy Awards.

name: Goldfinger
tagline: Investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve.

name: Hide and Seek
tagline: As a widower tries to piece together his life in the wake of his wife's suicide, his daughter finds solace -- at first -- in her imaginary friend.

name: Up Close & Personal
tagline: An ambitious young woman, determined to build a career in TV journalism, gets good advice from her first boss, and they fall in love.

name: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
tagline: Mere seconds before the Earth is to be demolished by an alien construction crew, journeyman Arthur Dent is swept off the planet by his friend Ford Prefect, a researcher penning a new edition of "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy."

name: Atonement
tagline: Fledgling writer Briony Tallis, as a 13-year-old, irrevocably changes the course of several lives when she accuses her older sister's lover of a crime he did not commit. Based on the British romance novel by Ian McEwan.

name: Something to Talk About
tagline: A woman's world is rocked when she discovers her husband is cheating on her.

name: Bull Durham
tagline: A fan who has an affair with one minor-league baseball player each season meets an up-and-coming pitcher and the experienced catcher assigned to him.

name: Apocalypto
tagline: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, the rulers insist the key to prosperity is to build more temples and offer human sacrifices. Jaguar Paw, a young man captured for sacrifice, flees to avoid his fate.

name: The Tale of Despereaux
tagline: The tale of three unlikely heroes - a misfit mouse who prefers reading books to eating them, an unhappy rat who schemes to leave the darkness of the dungeon, and a bumbling servant girl with cauliflower ears - whose fates are intertwined with that of the castle's princess.

name: Syriana
tagline: A politically-charged epic about the state of the oil industry in the hands of those personally involved and affected by it.

name: The Road to El Dorado
tagline: Two swindlers get their hands on a map to the fabled city of gold, El Dorado.

name: A Bridge Too Far
tagline: A historical telling of the failed attempt to capture several bridges on a road to Germany in World War II, in a campaign called Operation Market-Garden.

name: The Mighty Ducks
tagline: A self-centered lawyer is sentenced to community service coaching a rag tag youth hockey team.

name: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
tagline: Alice awakes in Raccoon City, only to find it has become infested with zombies and monsters. With the help of Jill Valentine and Carlos Olivera, Alice must find a way out of the city before it is destroyed by a nuclear missile.

name: The Net
tagline: A computer programmer stumbles upon a conspiracy, putting her life and the lives of those around her in great danger.

name: The Crow
tagline: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancée's murder.

name: The Hurricane
tagline: The story of Rubin "Hurricane" Carter, a boxer wrongly imprisoned for murder, and the people who aided in his fight to prove his innocence.

name: Resident Evil: Extinction
tagline: Survivors of the Raccoon City catastrophe travel across the Nevada desert, hoping to make it to Alaska. Alice joins the caravan and their fight against the evil Umbrella Corp.

name: Mighty Joe Young
tagline: After Mighty Joe Young is brought to America for safety reasons, he escapes and rampages through Hollywood, spurred by tormentors out for revenge.

name: Music and Lyrics
tagline: A washed up singer is given a couple days to compose a chart-topping hit for an aspiring teen sensation. Though he's never written a decent lyric in his life, he sparks with an offbeat younger woman with a flair for words.

name: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit
tagline: Jack Ryan, as a young covert CIA analyst, uncovers a Russian plot to crash the U.S. economy with a terrorist attack.

name: Eddie Murphy Raw
tagline: Eddie Murphy in a stand-up performance recorded live. For an hour and a half he talks about his favourite subjects: sex and women.

name: The Toy
tagline: An underemployed reporter finds himself literally purchased as a toy for a rich spoiled brat.

name: Diary of a Mad Black Woman

production.name: Diary of a Woman Productions Inc.

tagline: A couple's seemingly solid marriage begins to crumble when the wife discovers that her husband intends to divorce her.

name: A View to a Kill
tagline: An investigation of a horse-racing scam leads 007 to a mad industrialist who plans to create a worldwide microchip monopoly by destroying California's Silicon Valley.

name: Natural Born Killers
tagline: Two victims of traumatized childhoods become lovers and psychopathic serial murderers irresponsibly glorified by the mass media.

name: Angels in the Outfield
tagline: When a boy prays for a chance to have a family if the California Angels win the pennant, angels are assigned to make that possible.

name: Hot Tub Time Machine
tagline: A malfunctioning time machine at a ski resort takes a man back to 1986 with his two friends and nephew, where they must relive a fateful night and not change anything to make sure the nephew is born.

name: The Tuxedo
tagline: A hapless chauffer must take a comatosed secret agent's place using his special gadget-laden tuxedo.

name: K-PAX

production.name: IMF Internationale Medien und Film GmbH & Co. 2. Produktions KG

tagline: Prot is a patient at a mental hospital who claims to be from a far away Planet. His psychiatrist tries to help him, only to begin to doubt his own explanations.

name: Breakdown
tagline: A man searches for his missing wife after his car breaks down in the middle of the desert.

name: Home on the Range
tagline: To save their farm, the resident animals go bounty hunting for a notorious outlaw.

name: Under Siege 2: Dark Territory
tagline: Casey Ryback hops on a Colorado to LA train to start a vacation with his niece. Early into the trip, terrorists board the train and use it as a mobile HQ to hijack a top secret destructive US satellite.

name: When a Man Loves a Woman
tagline: An airline pilot and his wife are forced to face the consequences of her alcoholism when her addictions threaten her life and their daughter's safety. While the woman enters detox, her husband must face the truth of his enabling behavior.

name: Last Action Hero
tagline: A young movie fan gets thrown into the movie world of his favourite action film character.

name: Absolute Power
tagline: A career thief witnesses a horrific crime involving the U.S. President.

name: Little Women
tagline: The March sisters live and grow in post-Civil War America.

name: Popeye
tagline: The sailor man travels to a seaside town called Sweethaven, falls in love with Olive Oyl, adopts Swee'pea, and makes an enemy of Bluto.

name: Fiddler on the Roof
tagline: In prerevolutionary Russia, a Jewish peasant contends with marrying off three of his daughters while growing antisemitic sentiment threatens his village.

name: Evita
tagline: The hit musical based on the life of Evita Duarte, a B-picture Argentinian actress who eventually became the wife of Argentinian president Juan Perón, and the most beloved and hated woman in Argentina.

name: Serendipity
tagline: A couple reunite years after the night they first met, fell in love, and separated, convinced that one day they'd end up together.

name: Red Tails
tagline: A crew of African American pilots in the Tuskegee training program, having faced segregation while kept mostly on the ground during World War II, are called into duty under the guidance of Col. A.J. Bullard.

name: Pain & Gain
tagline: A trio of bodybuilders in Florida get caught up in an extortion ring and a kidnapping scheme that goes terribly wrong.

name: Major League
tagline: The new owner of the Cleveland Indians puts together a purposely horrible team so they'll lose and she can move the team. But when the plot is uncovered, they start winning just to spite her.

name: Are We Done Yet?
tagline: Newlyweds Nick (Ice Cube) and Suzanne (Long) decide to move to the suburbs to provide a better life for their two kids. But their idea of a dream home is disturbed by a contractor (McGinley) with a bizarre approach to business.

name: Australia
tagline: Set in northern Australia before World War II, an English aristocrat who inherits a sprawling ranch reluctantly pacts with a stock-man in order to protect her new property from a takeover plot. As the pair drive 2,000 head of cattle over unforgiving landscape, they experience the bombing of Darwin, Australia, by Japanese forces firsthand.

name: Old Dogs
tagline: Two friends and business partners find their lives turned upside down when strange circumstances lead to them being placed in the care of 7-year-old twins.

name: Runaway Jury
tagline: A juror on the inside and a woman on the outside manipulate a court trial involving a major gun manufacturer.

name: European Vacation
tagline: The Griswalds win a vacation tour across Europe where the usual havoc ensues.

name: Land of the Lost
tagline: On his latest expedition, Dr. Rick Marshall is sucked into a space-time vortex alongside his research assistant and a redneck survivalist. In this alternate universe, the trio make friends with a primate named Chaka, their only ally in a world full of dinosaurs and other fantastic creatures.

name: A Nightmare on Elm Street 4: The Dream Master
tagline: Freddy Krueger returns once again to terrorize the dreams of the remaining Dream Warriors, as well as those of a young woman who may know the way to defeat him for good.

name: Planes, Trains & Automobiles
tagline: A man must struggle to travel home for Thanksgiving, with an obnoxious slob of a shower ring salesman his only companion.

name: Racing Stripes
tagline: An abandoned zebra (voice of Frankie Muniz) grows up believing he is a racehorse, and, with the help of his barnyard friends and a teenage girl (Hayden Panettiere), sets out to achieve his dream of racing with thoroughbreds.

name: My Sister's Keeper
tagline: Anna Fitzgerald looks to earn medical emancipation from her parents who until now have relied on their youngest child to help their leukemia-stricken daughter Kate remain alive.

name: The Possession
tagline: A young girl buys an antique box at a yard sale, unaware that inside the collectible lives a malicious ancient spirit. The girl's father teams with his ex-wife to find a way to end the curse upon their child.

name: This Christmas
tagline: A Christmastime drama centered around the Whitfield family's first holiday together in four years.

name: Bugsy
tagline: The story of how Bugsy Siegel started Las Vegas.

name: Cobra
tagline: A tough-on-crime street cop must protect the only surviving witness to a strange murderous cult with far reaching plans.

name: Michael Clayton
tagline: A law firm brings in its "fixer" to remedy the situation after a lawyer has a breakdown while representing a chemical company that he knows is guilty in a multi-billion dollar class action suit.

name: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Dog Days
tagline: School is out and Greg is ready for the days of summer, when all his plans go wrong. What on earth is he going to do all summer?

name: Addams Family Values
tagline: A comical Gothic horror-movie-type family tries to rescue their beloved uncle from his gold-digging new love.

name: Men of Honor
tagline: The story of Carl Brashear, the first African American, then also the first amputee, US Navy Diver and the man who trained him.

name: Firewall
tagline: A security specialist is forced into robbing the bank that he's protecting, as a bid to pay off his family's ransom.

name: About Last Night
tagline: Follow two couples as they journey from the bar to the bedroom and are eventually put to the test in the real world.

name: Date Movie
tagline: Spoof of romantic comedies which focuses on a man, his crush, his parents, and her father.

name: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
tagline: After Cheryl Frasier and Stan Fields are kidnapped, Gracie goes undercover in Las Vegas to find them.

name: The Dilemma
tagline: A man discovers that his best friend's wife is having an affair.

name: Return to Never Land
tagline: In London during World War II, this is the story of Wendy's daughter, Jane, who is kidnapped by Captain Hook and Peter Pan must come to the rescue.

name: Peter Pan
tagline: The Darling family children receive a visit from Peter Pan, who takes them to Never Never Land where an ongoing war with the evil Pirate Captain Hook is taking place.

name: Just Like Heaven
tagline: A lonely landscape architect falls for the spirit of the beautiful woman who used to live in his new apartment.

name: The Game
tagline: Wealthy San Francisco financier Nicholas Van Orton gets a strange birthday present from wayward brother Conrad: a live-action game that consumes his life.

name: The House Bunny
tagline: After Playboy bunny Shelley is kicked out of the playboy mansion, she finds a job as the house mother for a sorority full of socially awkward girls.

name: Malcolm X
tagline: Biographical epic of the controversial and influential Black Nationalist leader, from his early life and career as a small-time gangster, to his ministry as a member of the Nation of Islam and his assassination.
